meanings.definition: Release (something) before it is officially available.
meanings.sent1: The company prereleases the new software to gather feedback from users.
meanings.sent2: It is common for movie studios to prerelease trailers to build anticipation.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to prerelease the dessert to surprise the guests.
meanings.sent4: The author prereleases chapters of the book to keep readers engaged.
meanings.sent5: Prereleasing the album allowed fans to get a sneak peek before the official launch.

meanings.definition: An event or product that is released before the official launch.
meanings.sent1: The prereleases of the video game attracted a lot of attention from gamers.
meanings.sent2: Attendees at the tech conference got exclusive access to the prereleases of new gadgets.
meanings.sent3: The store's prereleases of limited edition sneakers caused a frenzy among collectors.
meanings.sent4: The fashion designer's prereleases set the trend for the upcoming season.
meanings.sent5: Fans eagerly awaited the prereleases of the band's merchandise.
